item.title: Compiler errors
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

I added an anti-nuller in my server and got this error

server.java:210: error: illegal start of expression public static int MaxConnections = 2; ^ server.java:210: error: illegal start of expression public static int MaxConnections = 2; ^ server.java:210: error: ';' expected public static int MaxConnections = 2; ^ server.java:211: error: illegal start of expression public static String[] Connections = new String[MaxConnections]; ^ server.java:211: error: illegal start of expression public static String[] Connections = new String[MaxConnections]; ^ server.java:211: error: ';' expected public static String[] Connections = new String[MaxConnections]; ^ server.java:212: error: illegal start of expression public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections]; ^ server.java:212: error: illegal start of expression public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections]; ^ server.java:212: error: ';' expected public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections]; ^ server.java:212: error: illegal start of expression public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections]; ^ server.java:212: error: ';' expected public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections]; ^ server.java:213: error: illegal start of expression public static boolean ShutDown = false; ^ server.java:213: error: illegal start of expression public static boolean ShutDown = false; ^ server.java:213: error: ';' expected public static boolean ShutDown = false; ^ server.java:214: error: illegal start of expression public static int ShutDownCounter = 0; ^ server.java:214: error: illegal start of expression public static int ShutDownCounter = 0; ^ server.java:214: error: ';' expected public static int ShutDownCounter = 0; ^ server.java:283: error: reached end of file while parsing } ^ 18 errors Press any key to continue . . .

How can i fix it

Read full topic
